item.title: Rc_reverse
item.description: Remote Control Analysis A couple of days ago I found some old remote controls around the house and I decided it was time to take out my old RTL-SDR and put it to good use. In this article I will describe step-by-step my experience with studying, reversing and understanding these old devices. Board analysis The first thing I did was to operate the remote, of course whenever I pressed the yellow button, the led on its side would light up signaling that everything was working fine.
